name: The Next Step (ItzTheNikolai)
description:
This game has been created for Major Jam 4: Cosmic. To match the cosmic theme, the game takes place on a mars-like planet with little vegetation as your species colonises it's first planet outside of its home planet!

The limitation "The player must cheat" has been met with cheat codes that are entered within the cheats menu. These cheat codes are formatted as "[what to change(id)] [new value]" and their proper use is vital to winning the game.

ids (to use for cheats):
  • population
  • food
  • water
  • ore
  • metal
We hope you have lots of fun playing! Be sure to leave feedback :)
